thread.title: Summit Commercial Finance Partners With Mintaka Financial
thread.title_full: Summit Commercial Finance Partners With Mintaka Financial

title: Summit Commercial Finance Partners With Mintaka Financial
text:
Summit Commercial Finance Partners With Mintaka Financial July 22, 2015, 06:49 AM Related: Mintaka Financial 
Mintaka Financial announced that Summit Commercial Finance has invested in Mintaka Financial, joining the company with 11 other leading commercial finance firms as an equity stakeholder.“Mintaka Financial is pleased to have Summit Commercial Finance on our team as we continue to expand our commercial finance products to small businesses across the country. Summit has long been a recognized leader in the equipment finance industry and our shared vision for empowering small businesses to thrive by delivering sustainable, viable lending solutions makes for a fitting partnership.” said David Schaefer, CEO of Mintaka Financial.“A core value at Summit Commercial Finance is to align with prominent organizations and people. Mintaka Financial’s employees and equity partners help us achieve this objective and present a great opportunity for Summit to expand our platform delivering superior solutions for our customers.” said Scott Forrest, Founder & CEO of Summit Commercial Finance. Today's Other News
